about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack to the acclaimed VR horror A Chair in a Room: Greenwater.

Featuring:
  • Full remastered soundtrack split of 14 parts
  • 3 bonus tracks including one unheard demo
  • Full mix of the entire soundtrack as a single track

Track list:
  • 00_AChairInARoom_Greenwater_OST
  • 01_A Reporter
  • 02_Under Observation
  • 03_A Swan
  • 04_Cypress Lodge
  • 05_Boat Ride
  • 06_The Pelican Motel
  • 07_Black Sheep
  • 08_Dark Room
  • 09_Lost Property
  • 10_Confession
  • 11_Under or In
  • 12_Final Decent
  • 13_Iraq Cell
  • 14_Repeat of Yesterday
  • 15_First Take (Bonus Track)
  • 16_Church Organ (Bonus Track)
  • 17_Missing Girl (Bonus Track)
